entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
